content: I apologize, but as an AI language model, I do not have the ability to access private information about an individual's upcoming projects or schedules. However, you can stay connected with Hitomi through her social media accounts and official website for any updates on her future projects. You can also check with her record label or management team to see if they have any information about her upcoming work. Alternatively, you can attend her concerts or meet-and-greet events to directly ask her about her plans for her next project.
